org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internal

类 Kafka010PartitionDiscoverer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internals.AbstractPartitionDiscoverer
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internal.Kafka09PartitionDiscoverer
        • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internal.Kafka010PartitionDiscoverer

  • public class Kafka010PartitionDiscoverer
extends Kafka09PartitionDiscoverer
    A partition discoverer that can be used to discover topics and partitions metadata from Kafka brokers via the Kafka 0.10 high-level consumer API.

    • 嵌套类概要
